PleaseChooseNotebookToExport: Please enter the notebooks number to export :
ErrorImageExtract: Error while extracting images of the page.
ErrorDuringPageProcessing: Error during processing of page {0} [{1}]. Page ignored. Error message : {2}
ErrorDuringSectionProcessing: Error during processing of section {0} [{1}]. Error message : {2}
ErrorDuringNotebookProcessingNbTree: Error during processing of notebook {0} [{1}]. Can't browse notebook tree. Error message : {2}
NotebookNameNotFound: Notebook '{0}' not found. Is it actually open in OneNote ?
WelcomeMessage:
Before continue, please verify that :

* OneNote and Word of Office suite are correctly installed
* OneNote is running and the Notebooks to export are opened
* PanDoc software is installed (https://pandoc.org/installing.html)
This tool and OneNote are started with normal priviledges (NOT as an administrator)

Known limitations:
* The free application 'One Note For Windows' is not supported
* File attachments with certain extensions are not exported, including : wma, wmv, mpg, svg, mp3 (Issue #39)
* Password protected sections are not exported
* Hand-writting text is not exported

/!\ Allways keep a backup of your OneNote notebooks in case you discover later that some data is missing in the export /!\
ErrorWhileStartingOnenote: Error during OneNote execution. Please check that OneNote is running. Try to close and restart OneNote.
ErrorDuringOneNoteExport: OneNote has returned an error during page export : '{0}'
